import React, { useState } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import cl from './style.module.css' import djostik1 from '../images/djostik1.png' import djostik2 from '../images/djostik2.png' import djostik3 from '../images/djostik3.png' import djostik4 from '../images/djostik4.png' import djostik5 from '../images/djostik5.png' export default function DetailsPage() { const [itemDetails, setItemDetails] = useState([ { id: 1, itemName: 'Havic HV G-92 Gamepad', rating: 4, reviews: 150, instock: true, price: 192.00, aboutItem: 'PlayStation 5 Controller Skin High quality vinyl with air channel adhesive for easy bubble free install & mess free removal Pressure sensitive.',colours:['blue', 'red'] } ]) return ( <>

Acount / Gaming / Havic HV G-92 Gamepad

) }
